Class Controller

java.lang.Object
java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public class Controller extends MouseAdapter
Manages user interactions, game flow, and updates between the GUI and the game board. This class handles mouse events for planting plants, collecting sun, and navigating between different game screens (main menu, game board, game over).
Since:
2025-07-30

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(Gui g, Board b)
      Constructs a new Controller instance, linking it to the GUI and game board. Initializes game over state.
      Parameters:
      g - The GUI instance.
      b - The game board instance.

  • Method Details

    • addMouseListeners

      public void addMouseListeners()
      Adds mouse listeners to the plant selection buttons and the game board. Handles plant selection, plant placement, and sun collection.

    • goMainMenu

      public void goMainMenu()
      Navigates the game to the main menu screen. Sets up action listeners for level selection buttons.

    • goGameOverScreen

      public void goGameOverScreen(boolean didPlayerWin, int level)
      Displays the game over screen, indicating whether the player won or lost. Sets up action listeners for "Try Again" and "Main Menu" buttons, and "Next Level" buttons if the player won.
      Parameters:
      didPlayerWin - true if the player won the level, false otherwise.
      level - The level that was just played.

    • startGame

      public void startGame(int level)
      Starts a new game at the specified level. Initializes player and board, sets up GUI, and starts the game loop timer.
      Parameters:
      level - The level number to start.

    • updateModel

      public boolean updateModel(double timeElapsed)
      Updates the game model (board state, entities) based on elapsed time. Checks for game over conditions.
      Parameters:
      timeElapsed - Time elapsed since the last update.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise.
